item.title: World Composition: Level loading/unloading
item.description: TLDR: What you will get from this post ðŸ¤” After reading this post, you should have a basic understanding of: what is World Composition; pros and cons of World Composition; my solution to some of these problems; Basics: What is World Composition? To put it bluntly, World Composition is a system designed by Epic to manage large worlds: a system where you don’t have to worry about the loading and unloading levels logic and let the streamming distance do its thing.
